data.name: Dark Slowking
rules: This Pokémon is both Psychic Darkness type.

abilities.name: Cunning
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may look at the top card of your opponent's deck. Then, you may shuffle his or her deck. This power can't be used if Dark Slowking is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Litter
attacks.text: You may discard a combination of up to 2 Pokémon Tool cards and Rocket's Secret Machine cards from your hand. If you do, this attack does 20 damage plus 30 more damage for each card you discarded.

data.name: Slowking

abilities.name: Second Sight
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may look at the top 3 cards of that player's deck and put them back on top of that player's deck in any order. This power can't be used if Slowking is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Psyshock
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

data.flavorText: It has incredible intellect and intuition. Whatever the situation, it remains calm and collected.

data.name: Slowking

attacks.name: Revelation
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a Trainer card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Psychic
attacks.text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.

data.flavorText: Its nonchalant reaction to everything somehow gives this Pokémon an imposing presence.

abilities.name: Item Search
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for a Pokémon Tool card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward. This power can't be used if Slowking is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Aftermath
attacks.text: Does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each Pokémon Tool card in your discard pile. You can't add more than 60 damage in this way.

attacks.name: Bursting Hand
attacks.text: Look at your opponent's hand. This attack does 10 damage times the number of Energy cards there.

attacks.name: Shuffle Attack
attacks.text: Look at a number of cards on top of your opponent's deck equal to the number of Energy cards attached to the Defending Pokémon. Put those cards in any order, and then put them back on top of your opponent's deck.

data.name: Dark Slowking

abilities.name: Cunning
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, look at the top card of your opponent's deck. Then, you may have your opponent shuffle his or her deck. This power can't be used if Dark Slowking is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Mind Shock
attacks.text: Don't apply Weakness or Resistance for this attack.

data.flavorText: Each time it yawns, the Shellder on its head releases an enzyme that makes it grow even smarter.

data.name: Slowking

abilities.name: Mind Games
abilities.text: Whenever your opponent plays a Trainer card, you may flip a coin. If heads, that card does nothing. Put it on top of your opponent's deck. This power can't be used if Slowking is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Mind Blast
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 10 more damage and the Defending Pokémon is now Confused. If tails, this attack does 20 damage.

data.flavorText: When its head was bitten, toxins entered Slowpoke's head and unlocked an extraordinary power.

abilities.name: Prize Shift
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may choose a card from your hand and put it as a Prize card face up. If you do, choose 1 of your face-down Prize cards without looking and put it into your hand. This power can't be used if Slowking is affected by a Special Condition or if all of your Prize cards are face up.

attacks.name: Psychic Option
attacks.text: If Slowking has a Water Energy card attached to it, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage. If Slowking has a Psychic Energy card attached to it, discard a Special Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon, if any.

data.name: Slowking

abilities.name: Royal Flash
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, move an Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon to 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Psych Up
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon's Psych Up attack does 40 more damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

data.flavorText: When its head was bitten, toxins entered Slowpoke's head and unlocked an extraordinary power.

data.name: Slowking

abilities.name: Second Sight
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may look at the top 3 cards of either player's deck and put them back on top of that player's deck in any order. This power can't be used if Slowking is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Psyshock
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

data.flavorText: It has incredible intellect and intuition. Whatever the situation, it remains calm and collected.

data.name: Slowking

abilities.name: Trump Card
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if any of your Pokémon were Knocked Out during your opponent's last turn, search your deck for any 1 card and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward. This power can't be used if Slowking is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Psych Up
attacks.text: During your next turn, Slowking's Psych Up attack's base damage is 60.

data.flavorText: Being bitten by Shellder gave it intelligence comparable to that of award-winning scientists.

data.name: Slowking

attacks.name: Drift Ashore
attacks.text: Search your deck for a card and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Unarmed
attacks.text: If you have no cards in your hand, ignore all Energy in this attack's cost.

data.flavorText: A poisonous bite reacted with its system, blessing it with the enhanced intellect of a genius. It has full control of its psychic powers.

data.name: Slowking

attacks.name: Psy Bolt
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Hand Press
attacks.text: If you have more cards in your hand than your opponent, this attack does 30 more damage.

data.flavorText: Being bitten by Shellder gave it intelligence comparable to that of award-winning scientists.

data.name: Slowking

attacks.name: Memory Melt
attacks.text: Look at your opponent's hand and put a card you find there in the Lost Zone.

attacks.name: Psychic
attacks.text: This attack does 20 more damage times the amount of Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

data.flavorText: This Pokémon is so famed for its intellect that a proverb still persists in some regions: "When in doubt, ask Slowking."

attacks.name: Bursting Hand
attacks.text: Look at your opponent's hand. This attack does 10 damage times the number of Energy cards there.

attacks.name: Shuffle Attack
attacks.text: Look at a number of cards on top of your opponent's deck equal to the number of Energy cards attached to the Defending Pokémon. Put those cards in any order, and then put them back on top of your opponent's deck.

abilities.name: Opponent's Choice
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may reveal the top 2 cards of your deck and your opponent chooses 1 of them. Put that card into your hand and the other card on the bottom of your deck. This power can't be used if Slowking is affected by a Special Condition.

data.name: Galarian Slowking

abilities.name: Mysterious Potion
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may choose 1 of your Pokémon and flip a coin. If heads, heal 90 damage from that Pokémon. If tails, put 3 damage counters on that Pokémon.

data.flavorText: While chanting strange spells, this Pokémon combines its internal toxins with what it's eaten, creating strange potions.

data.name: Galarian Slowking V
rules: V rule: When your Pokémon V is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Concoction
attacks.text: Discard a card from your hand. If you do, draw 3 cards.

attacks.name: Word of Ruin
attacks.text: At the end of your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon will be Knocked Out.

data.name: Galarian Slowking VMAX
rules: VMAX rule: When your Pokémon VMAX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 3 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Max Toxify
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned. During Pokémon Checkup, put 12 damage counters on that Pokémon instead of 1.

data.name: Galarian Slowking V
rules: V rule: When your Pokémon V is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Concoction
attacks.text: Discard a card from your hand. If you do, draw 3 cards.

attacks.name: Word of Ruin
attacks.text: At the end of your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon will be Knocked Out.

data.name: Galarian Slowking V
rules: V rule: When your Pokémon V is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Concoction
attacks.text: Discard a card from your hand. If you do, draw 3 cards.

attacks.name: Word of Ruin
attacks.text: At the end of your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon will be Knocked Out.

data.name: Galarian Slowking VMAX
rules: VMAX rule: When your Pokémon VMAX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 3 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Max Toxify
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned. During Pokémon Checkup, put 12 damage counters on that Pokémon instead of 1.

data.name: Slowking ex
rules: Tera: As long as this Pokémon is on your Bench, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks (both yours and your opponent's).
Pokémon ex rule: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Profound Knowledge
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Wise Headbutt
attacks.text: You may search your deck for up to 2 cards and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

data.name: Slowking ex
rules: Tera: As long as this Pokémon is on your Bench, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks (both yours and your opponent's).
Pokémon ex rule: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Profound Knowledge
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Wise Headbutt
attacks.text: You may search your deck for up to 2 cards and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Seek Inspiration
attacks.text: Discard the top card of your deck, and if that card is a Pokémon that doesn't have a Rule Box, choose 1 of its attacks and use it as this attack. (Pokémon ex, Pokémon V, etc. have Rule Boxes.)

attacks.name: Wash the Slate Clean
attacks.text: You may put 2 Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon into their hand.
